mobiles.name: shaman
mobiles.long_description: The village shaman tends to the weak and infirm here.
mobiles.description:
The shaman is a well respected and devoted healer and mystic. He spends his
time curing the ailments of the inhabitants of this village, or those of any
strangers that may pass by.

mobiles.name: flint knapper flint-knapper
mobiles.long_description: The village flint-knapper is here repairing crude tools.
mobiles.description:
While the knapper's primary job is to craft tools for the village, such is
his skill that he may also be able to repair your equipment. Contact with
merchants from more advanced civilisations to the south have made him
remarkably conversant with the properties of metals such as copper and silver
and alloys such as bronze.

mobiles.name: trader
mobiles.long_description: A swarthy southern trader is here hawking his wares.
mobiles.description:
This fellow is possessed of much darker skin and eyes than his current
neighbors, hailing as he does from the island kingdoms far to the south. He
has brought with him a variety of bronze arms and armor, as well as the
occasional crude iron oddity.

mobiles.name: merc
mobiles.long_description: A tough mercenary offers to hire out his men to you.
mobiles.description: Type list to see what he has to offer.

mobiles.name: witchdoctor
mobiles.long_description: The village witchdoctor is here selling a variety of potions and brews.
mobiles.description:
This young woman, one of the chief's many daughters, has travelled far and
wide, and gathered a variety of exotic herbs and roots that she blends into
marvellous potions. They taste even worse than they smell...

mobiles.name: wise woman
mobiles.long_description: The village wise woman cracks a toothless grin as you enter.
mobiles.description:
Age may have taken what beauty this crone once possessed, but it hasn't
robbed her of her wits. She is more knowledgable in the properties of items
than anyone else in the known world (which, admittedly, doesn't cover very
much. In fact, to these villagers it is about as far as you can see on a
clear day).

mobiles.name: beastmaster
mobiles.long_description: The village beastmaster is here wrestling with a large bear.
mobiles.description:
When he has the time, this impossibly huge man will gladly sell you a pet
that he has domesticated, though from the look of it you may have doubts
in his ability to exact obedience. That bear sure doesn't look tame...

mobiles.name: trader northerner
mobiles.long_description: A grizzled northerner offers to sell you some supplies.
mobiles.description:
This stout hunter spends six months of the year trapping for fur, and the rest
of the year fashioning and selling basic equipment.

mobiles.name: daughter woman girl
mobiles.long_description: A daughter of the tribe is here selling food.
mobiles.description:
The crop was good this year, and the villagers have sufficient to sell to
travellers and other villagers.

mobiles.name: brewer
mobiles.long_description: The village brewer is handing out samples of his sacred drink.
mobiles.description:
The art of brewing is held sacred by the northern tribes, and the brewers
are considered holy men. In accordance with their beliefs, the brewers hand
out samples of their sacred draught to all who pass by, and while there is
no real cost, a small "donation" to the sacred coffer is expected. And when
the brewer is the size of a grizzly bear, few refuse.

mobiles.name: hedgehog
mobiles.long_description: A hedgehog, well, does nothing at you.
mobiles.description: The hedgehog looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

mobiles.name: otter
mobiles.long_description: A loyal, sleek growls at you.
mobiles.description: The otter looks like a fierce fighter.

mobiles.name: hawk
mobiles.long_description: A fierce but loyal hawk is here.
mobiles.description: The hawk looks like a fierce fighter.

mobiles.name: grizzly bear
mobiles.long_description: A large, loyal grizzly bear is here.
mobiles.description: The grizzly bear looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

mobiles.name: aurochs
mobiles.long_description: A HUGE Aurochs stomps its feet and lowers its head to charge.
mobiles.description: The aurochs is a BAD ASS.

mobiles.name: champion
mobiles.long_description: The village champion flexes his mighty thews and grins at you.
mobiles.description:
The village champion once tore the head off a rabid Mastodon with his thumbs.
Imagine what he could do to you...

mobiles.name: merchant
mobiles.long_description: A hook-nosed merchant from the desert kingdoms rubs his hands together.
mobiles.description:
This fellow may not speak your language well, but the language he does know
very well makes conversation suddenly become much simpler- MONEY.

mobiles.name: chieftain
mobiles.long_description: The village chieftain welcomes you to her village.
mobiles.description:
This strapping giant of a woman has flaming red hair and biceps bigger than
your thighs. She has ruled this village wisely for many years, through lean
times and times of plenty, and her people have the utmost faith in her
ability. Time and the birth of many children have not softened her
well-muscled frame - she is still a very attractive woman, and the men of the
village (and some women too) vie for her favours.

mobiles.name: villager
mobiles.long_description: A fur-clad villager hurries by.
mobiles.description:
The villagers are a hardy lot, toughened by their environment and their
rugged lifestyle, and you marvel at their good condition as they pass.

mobiles.name: villager
mobiles.long_description: A fur-clad villager hurries by.
mobiles.description:
The villagers are a hardy lot, toughened by their environment and their
rugged lifestyle, and you marvel at their good condition as they pass.

mobiles.name: child
mobiles.long_description: A child engages in rough horse play with other village children.
mobiles.description:
The children of the village are a rough and tumble lot, used to working hard
and playing harder.

mobiles.name: idiot
mobiles.long_description: The village idiot gawks at you.
mobiles.description: When he was young, this poor fellow had his skull staved in by a horse kick.

mobiles.name: drunk
mobiles.long_description: A village drunk.
mobiles.description: This fellow has evidently made many generous donations to the village brewer.

mobiles.name: beggar
mobiles.long_description: A beggar sits in the dirt asking for donations.
mobiles.description:
The inhabitants of this village are a tough lot, but not ungenerous, and it
is likely that this fellow will have a roof over his head soon, provided by
one of the more prosperous villagers.

mobiles.name: thief
mobiles.long_description: A thief adroitly cuts the strings of another fat merchant's purse.
mobiles.description: This unsavory fellow preys on the rich foreign merchants from the south.

mobiles.name: wolf
mobiles.long_description: A scrawny wolf is here looking for food.
mobiles.description:
This wolf has strayed in from the wild, driven by hunger. The villagers are
quick to repel such unwelcome wildlife, and it is only a matter of time
before the militia run it off.

mobiles.name: rat
mobiles.long_description: A black rat.
mobiles.description:
These mangy black rodents came with the merchants from the south, hidden
amongst their goods, and have quickly become a nuisance, being scavengers
and carriers of disease.

mobiles.name: dog
mobiles.long_description: A stray dog whines piteously at you.
mobiles.description:
This mongrel is the unwanted offspring of some hunter's sled dogs, left to
fend for itself here in the village.

mobiles.name: militia member
mobiles.short_description: a member of the village militia
mobiles.long_description: A member of the village militia eyes you suspiciously.
mobiles.description:
Like most civilizations of the time, the northern villagers have no organised
standing military or police force. However, the recent influx of foreigners
and bandits has necessitated the introduction of a militia to keep the peace.

mobiles.name: militia member
mobiles.short_description: a member of the village militia
mobiles.long_description: A member of the village militia eyes you suspiciously.
mobiles.description:
Like most civilizations of the time, the northern villagers have no organised
standing military or police force. However, the recent influx of foreigners
and bandits has necessitated the introduction of a militia to keep the peace.

mobiles.name: militia member
mobiles.short_description: a member of the village militia
mobiles.long_description: A member of the village militia hefts a large club and eyes you suspiciously.
mobiles.description:
Like most civilizations of the time, the northern villagers have no organised
standing military or police force. However, the recent influx of foreigners
and bandits has necessitated the introduction of a militia to keep the peace.

mobiles.name: minoan merc merc1
mobiles.long_description: A Minoan mercenary scowls menacingly at you.
mobiles.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.

mobiles.name: assyrian merc merc2
mobiles.long_description: An Assyrian Mercenary scowls menacingly at you.
mobiles.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.

mobiles.name: egyptian merc merc3
mobiles.long_description: An Egyptian mercenary scowls menacingly at you.
mobiles.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.

mobiles.name: trojan merc merc4
mobiles.long_description: A Trojan mercenary scowls menacingly at you.
mobiles.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.

mobiles.name: nubian merc merc5
mobiles.long_description: A Nubian mercenary scowls menacingly at you.
mobiles.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.

mobiles.name: mycenaean merc merc6
mobiles.long_description: A Mycenaean mercenary scowls menacingly at you.
mobiles.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.

old_objects.name: key
old_objects.description: The key to the village gates.

old_objects.name: barrel beer
old_objects.description: A beer barrel has been left here.

old_objects.name: bottle beer
old_objects.description: A beer bottle has been left here.

old_objects.name: bottle ale
old_objects.short_description: a bottle of home brew ale
old_objects.description: A dark bottle of ale has been left here.

old_objects.name: bottle firebreather
old_objects.description: A firebreather has been left here.

old_objects.name: bottle local
old_objects.short_description: a bottle of brewer's specialty ("Holy Water")
old_objects.description: A dark bottle has been left here.

old_objects.name: torch
old_objects.description: A large torch.

old_objects.name: lamp
old_objects.description: A stone lamp that uses animal fat as fuel has been left here.

old_objects.name: brew yellow
old_objects.description: A yellow brew.

old_objects.name: skin water buffalo
old_objects.description: A buffalo water skin is on the floor.

old_objects.name: jug water
old_objects.description: A large jug of water sloshes on the floor.

old_objects.name: club
old_objects.description: A heavy club sheathed in lead lies here.

old_objects.name: mace
old_objects.description: A bone mace lies here.

old_objects.name: dagger
old_objects.description: A bronze dagger lies here.

old_objects.name: blade sword
old_objects.description: A broad, heavy bronze blade lies here.

old_objects.name: sandals
old_objects.description: A pair of sandals lies here.

old_objects.name: belt
old_objects.description: A belt crafted of hide is curled up here.

old_objects.name: bronze helm
old_objects.description: A bronze helm.

old_objects.name: cloak
old_objects.description: A rough fur cloak is here.

old_objects.name: ring
old_objects.description: A bronze ring.

old_objects.name: black bread
old_objects.description: Black bread.

old_objects.name: cheese
old_objects.description: A sour cheese.

old_objects.name: dried meat
old_objects.description: A strip of unidentifiable dried meat.

old_objects.name: egg
old_objects.description: An egg (raw), warm from the nest.

old_objects.name: potion
old_objects.description: A foul potion rolls around here.

old_objects.name: totem
old_objects.description: The village totem stands here.

old_objects.name: wolf head
old_objects.description: The champion's wolf's head is here.

old_objects.name: club
old_objects.description: The chief's oak club is lying here in the dirt.

old_objects.name: stick
old_objects.description: A wooden stick.

old_objects.name: wooden club
old_objects.description: A wooden club is lying here.

old_objects.name: boiled leather jerkin
old_objects.description: A boiled leather jerkin is lying here.

old_objects.name: bone bracelet
old_objects.description: A rune-covered bone bracelet is lying here.

old_objects.name: fur cloak
old_objects.description: A fur cloak is lying here.

old_objects.name: helm
old_objects.description: A boar tusk helm lies here.

old_objects.name: shield
old_objects.description: An ox-hide shield lies here.

old_objects.name: spear
old_objects.description: A sturdy throwing spear has been thrust into the ground here.

old_objects.name: papyrus
old_objects.description: A blank papyrus is here.

old_objects.name: potion
old_objects.description: A shimmering potion is here.

old_objects.name: gate
old_objects.description: A magical stone gate allows one to pass through to other worlds.

rooms.name: Outside the Shaman's Hut
rooms.description:
You are standing outside the wooden hut where the Shaman of the village
resides. Paths stretch out to the east, south and west from here.

rooms.name: The Interior of the Shaman's Hut
rooms.description:
You cough as you enter the smoky interior of this cramped hut, your eyes
watering as the odor of some bubbling concoction in an iron cauldron wafts
toward you. In the center of this hut the shaman awaits, quietly meditating.
A variety of furs, bones, charms and trinkets line the walls, doubtless
serving as focii for the shaman's mystic powers.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are walking along a path of packed earth that heads north toward the
Shaman's hut.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening. The village square outside
the Shaman's hut lies a short way to the north of here.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening. Several children suddenly
rush by, immersed in some strange activity, the rules of which are quite
unfathomable to you.

rooms.name: Approaching the Western Gate
rooms.description:
You are approaching the western gates of the village, which are constantly
patrolled by the militia. There is no-one else about here, as the
concentration of residences and shops is nearer to the center of the village.

rooms.name: Approaching the Eastern Gate
rooms.description:
You are approaching the eastern gates of the village, which are constantly
patrolled by the militia. There is no-one else about here, as the
concentration of residences and shops is nearer to the center of the village.

rooms.name: Inside the Western Gates
rooms.description:
You have reached the westernmost extent of the village. To the west lie the
stout wooden gates, set in the wooden barrier that surrounds the village.
Members of the militia, on the lookout for bandits and wolves, grant you
a cursory nod as they go about their duties.

rooms.name: Inside the Eastern Gates
rooms.description:
You have reached the easternmost extent of the village. To the east lie the
stout wooden gates, set in the wooden barrier that surrounds the village.
Members of the militia, on the lookout for bandits and wolves, grant you
a cursory nod as they go about their duties.

rooms.name: Outside the Western Gates
rooms.description:
You are standing outside the Gates at the western end of town. They currently
stand open, but the militia are ready at a moment's notice to slam them shut
and bar them with heavy wooden crossbeams bound with rare iron imported from
the south.

rooms.name: Outside the Eastern Gates
rooms.description:
You are standing outside the Gates at the eastern end of town. They currently
stand open, but the militia are ready at a moment's notice to slam them shut
and bar them with heavy wooden crossbeams bound with rare iron imported from
the south.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

There is a path running up a hill here which you may ascend.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: A Dirt Path
rooms.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down
by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path
circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of
the larger structures within.

rooms.name: Outside a Village Clan Hut
rooms.description:
You are standing outside a hut in the village. It is a wooden walled structure
with a thatched roof, and a sturdy oak door. Occasionally a villager enters
or exits the hut, sparing you a curious glance as they do. A crude etching
upon the doors of this hut marks it as the Horse Clan hut.

rooms.name: Inside the Hut
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the hut. The sounds and smells of cooking emanate
from the east, while quiet conversation can be heard to the west. You feel
slightly nervous about intruding upon this clan, but then again that's
what your profession is all about, really. Intruding.

rooms.name: The Meeting Room
rooms.description:
You have entered the common room of this hut. Several villagers sit about,
sipping at their ales and chatting quietly with each other. As you enter
they smile and bid you welcome, and ask you to stay and enjoy some good
conversation for a while.

rooms.name: The Kitchen
rooms.description:
In here several teenagers of both sexes rush about preparing the evening
meal under the watchful eye of a hefty cook, who helps them along with the
occasional shout or cuff on the ear.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

The chieftain's lodge lies to the west of here.

rooms.name: The Chieftain's Lodge
rooms.description:
This is where the chieftain resides. It may seem to be a small dwelling
for a figure of such importance, but it should be remembered that she has
it to herself, while most other villagers live with their clans in groups of
up to thirty, residing in three room lodges.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

The flint-knepper practices his trade to the west of here.

rooms.name: The Flint-Knepper
rooms.description:
You are greeted with a sudden blast of heat from the furnace as you enter
the smithy. Wiping sweat from your brow, you gaze about, taking the place
in. Various items of armor in various stages of repair line the walls. A
huge, muscular man is using a massive hammer to beat the dents out of a
suit of rather battered-looking bronze plate. The flint-knepper has learnt
skills far more advanced than his contemporaries, thanks to the many
visitors this village attracts, and his forge shows evidence of this.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Storage Hut
rooms.description:
This hut is used to store the goods of the many merchants that come to this
village. It currently holds little of interest, being filled largely with
bales of hay and coils of hemp rope.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Trader's Den
rooms.description:
This hut has been loaned by the chieftain to a travelling arms specialist,
who is currently doing a roaring trade with the locals, who are eager to
acquire the rare metal weapons he has bought with him from the south.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: Militia Hut
rooms.description:
Here the foreign mercenaries who have come to the north looking for
employment gather. You may take advantage of their services for a sizeable
sum of gold should you wish to.

rooms.name: Merc Store
rooms.description:
You shouldn't be here. Go Away. Or I'll Tell.

Oh look- a garbled transmission from Outer Space-
and a large fries.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

The witchdoctor's hut is to the north of here.

rooms.name: The Witch Doctor's Hut
rooms.description:
This hut is cram-packed with magical artefacts, items and spell components
of every type imaginable (and several unimaginable). Forcing your way through
the clutter, you eventually find an assistant, a raven-haired witch doctor who
smiles sweetly and welcomes you to her hut.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

The wise woman's hut is to the north.

rooms.name: The Wise Woman's Residence
rooms.description:
The Wise Woman of the village lives in this run-down old hut. People come
to her to avail themselves of her remarkable ability to determine the nature
of items of all types (there's no other reason to come here, really).

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

The beastmaster's hut is to the north.

rooms.name: The Beastmaster's Hut
rooms.description:
The Beastmaster captures and trains the wild animals of the north, and then
sells them to the merchants from the south. It is a very profitable but
extremely dangerous profession, as the many scars on his brawny body
suggest.

rooms.name: Pet Store Storage
rooms.description:
You shouldn't be here. Go Away. Or I'll Tell.







NOW!

rooms.name: Outside a Village Clan Hut
rooms.description:
You are standing outside a hut in the village. It is a wooden walled structure
with a thatched roof, and a sturdy oak door. Occasionally a villager enters
or exits the hut, sparing you a curious glance as they do. A crude etching
upon the doors of this hut marks it as the Bear Clan hut.

rooms.name: Inside the Hut
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the hut. The sounds and smells of cooking emanate
from the east, while quiet conversation can be heard to the west. You feel
slightly nervous about intruding upon this clan, but then again that's
what your profession is all about, really. Intruding.

rooms.name: The Meeting Room
rooms.description:
You have entered the common room of this hut. Several villagers sit about,
sipping at their ales and chatting quietly with each other. As you enter
they smile and bid you welcome, and ask you to stay and enjoy some good
conversation for a while.

rooms.name: The Kitchen
rooms.description:
In here several teenagers of both sexes rush about preparing the evening
meal under the watchful eye of a hefty cook, who helps them along with the
occasional shout or cuff on the ear.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

A trapper is selling his goods to the south.

rooms.name: A Hut
rooms.description:
A trapper has set up a business here, where he sells goods that he has
fashioned or acquired during his expeditions into the wilds. His stock is
usually rather low, as the villagers quickly buy up for the winter.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

Food is in fact available to the south of here, though it isn't hot.

rooms.name: A Supply Hut
rooms.description:
Some enterprising young women have set up a small shop here, where they
sell off the surplus food that is not required to provision their Clans.
You may purchase supplies for your travels here.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown
about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the
icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find
a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.

The brewer's hut is south of here.

rooms.name: The Brewer's Hut
rooms.description:
It is here that the village Brewer practices his holy trade. Should you
wish to indulge, you may obtain alcohol from the Brewer, though a small
donation is in order.

rooms.name: A Path in the Village
rooms.description:

rooms.name: The Common Hall
rooms.description:
These rooms are used by locals and foreigners alike to relax, sing songs and
enjoy each other's company. Feel free to stay as long as you wish.

rooms.description:
